message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a deep learning method for action recognition in videos by transferring knowledge from images using video keyframes as a bridge. This involves domain-invariant representations learning and cross-modal feature fusion, which are common topics in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also involves multimedia (cs.MM) and information retrieval (cs.IR) aspects, as it deals with different media types and similarity metrics. Finally, the paper is related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as it proposes a novel method for enhancing action recognition.
